extendedInfo.description: Need to perform an elevator traffic analysis on an old elevator, or on one that cannot give you the data you need? Tired of standing in front an elevator bank with a pen and paper trying to gather the data you need? Missing key data from the reports you get now? Do you know how many people actually get in the elevator during rush hour? Need to have data placed into tables and charts within an hour? The Elevator Traffic Analysis program will allow you to:a) Determine Average Wait Times b) Up Average Wait Timesc) Down Average Wait Times d) # of People that enter each elevator e) Total Amount of People that used the elevator in a time periodFor a complete manual, Email ES ControlsTables and Charts are made automatically and the report is generated into a PDF file that can be emailed from your Android Tablet device.
